attributes.additional_details: Either have organised bonfires or silent ones if not ban them all together
attributes.background: Fireworks need to either be silent/laser or banned all together due to the loud noises many animals have now being injured or worse, there’s also people who ptsd which is being worsened by the loud noises

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
